(4) A verified statement by the general manager of the service provider that he complied with all the requirements of the law
In everything related to the use of technology, including the privacy protection provisions established by law.
The service provider's commitment to increase the awareness of the service recipient and provide him with details as required
                                           In sections (4c)((5f) and (15-f) of this instruction.

(5) Details of the controls implemented by the service provider in connection with the use of visual identification technology.

(6) A written agreement between the service provider and the technology provider, as far as it exists, regulating the relationship
The parties in connection with the technology and its use for the purpose of visual identification, and determines the rights,
The obligations and responsibilities of the parties to the agreement, in a way that ensures compliance with the provisions of the law and in general
                     This is the instructions of regulation 15 of the privacy protection regulations - information security.

C. Any substantial change in the technology or the service provided by the service provider using the technology
                           Requires obtaining the approval of the Chairman of the Securities Authority prior to its implementation.




                                          23
                                                               18. Obligations of the service provider

It will be clarified that the purpose of this provision is to fulfill the obligations imposed by the money laundering prohibition order, in the provision of the service
Using technology for online identification. Nothing in the provision is intended to reduce other obligations of a provider
The service applicable to him in the provision of the service through online identification technology, according to any law, including this one
‫חובת נותן השירות לניהול מכלול הסיכונים הגלומים בשימוש בטכנולוגיה לזיהוי מקוון‪ ,‬לרבות‬
impersonation risks that will lead to embezzlement and fraud or cyber incidents, information security and cyber risks,
                                  Privacy risks, legal risks and compliance risks.




             _________________

                 Adv. Sefi Singer

          Chairman of the Securities Authority




                                          24

             For the operator of a social credit brokerage system, in an amount not exceeding 2,500 shekels

             In section (4B) (8 - ) the identification number in that document and the name of the country where the document was issued;

                 the issuer as well as the cardholder's account number if known;

the incorporation of the corporation or the registration number given to it by the operator; and to the identified corporation

(1) For an individual - his address listed in the document as stated in section (4b)(7)(2)(1) and (8)(8) or place
his residence, as he provided, which includes the name of the settlement, as well as the name of the street, the house number
       and the zip code, if this data exists, and for a foreign resident - also the name of the country;

Conducting his business in Israel, and if he is not conducting business in Israel - the place of his business center
outside of Israel, and all of these - as he said; The addressee will include the name of the settlement, as well as you
Street name, house number and zip code, if these data exist, and in a non-registered corporation
                                               In Israel - also the name of the country;

the name of the settlement as well as the name of the street, house number and zip code, if these data exist,
                 and for a corporation established by legislation abroad - also the name of the country;
"Credit brokerage system" - as defined in section 257 of the Services Supervision Law
                                               regulated financials;
"Operator" - a person who is required to have a license to operate a credit brokerage system according to the Supervision Law
                                         regulated financial services;
"Operator of a social system for credit intermediation" - as defined in section 257 of the Supervision Law
                                          regulated financial services;
                                               "Service recipient" - any of these:
              (1) Borrower or lender, even if another person requested the service on his behalf;
        (2) Regarding sections 12, 3 and 13 of the order - in addition to paragraph (1), each of these:
(a) Those who have undertaken to repay the credit, except for a guarantor, or those who seek to repay
                               the credit given and he is not the borrower;
                       (b) the person to whom the credit is returned and he is not the lender;

Ministry of Justice Records Department, Doxcenter ID, 801-02-2019-000297: Received on 04/10/2019 -
             "Receiving a service for a low amount" - receiving a service that during a period of six months he performed
             Operations with the same operator, with an aggregate credit amount not exceeding NIS 50,000
             NIS, except in the case of an operation in an amount that exceeds 5,000 NIS
             involves a country or territory listed in the first schedule; and accompanied by an amount
                                               minimal in a social system for credit mediation;
             "Granting credit" - as defined in Section 11A of the Law on the Supervision of Regulated Financial Services;
                                                    "Beneficiary" - as defined in section (7a)(1) of the law;
                      "office holder" - as defined in the Law on the Supervision of Regulated Financial Services;
             "Financial services provider" - as defined in the Law on the Supervision of Regulated Financial Services;
              "Financial asset" - as defined in Section 11A of the Law on the Supervision of Regulated Financial Services;
             "Lawyer" - holder of a license to practice law in Israel and for a corporation that is not registered in Israel,
             Also a lawyer licensed to practice law in the corporation's state of incorporation, provided
             that the country or territory in which the corporation is incorporated is not listed in the first schedule;
             If the country of association is one of the member countries of the OECD organization, also editor
                    A lawyer with a license to practice law in one of the member countries of the OECD organization
                                                 "Action" - a single action of a service recipient;
                                                                   "Name" - any of these:
             (1) For an individual - surname and first name, which are listed in the identification document as stated in section 4
             (2) For the corporation - its registered name, and if incorporated in a country where there is no registration of
                                                Corporations of its type - its name as provided;
             (3) For a corporation established by legislation - the name established by legislation, either in Israel or abroad;
                     (4) For a public institution, except for a corporation established by legislation - its name as given;
                                                                "Corporation" - any of these:
             (1) A company, partnership, cooperative association, Ottoman association, association or party
                                                              registered in Israel;
                                               (2) a body registered as a corporation outside of Israel;
             (3) A body incorporated in a country where there is no registration of bodies of its type, provided
                                               who presented a document attesting to being a corporation;
             "Related corporation" - a corporation that the operator has control over, or that has control over the operator
                                                           He is in control of it;
             "Resident" - as defined in the Population Registry Law, 1965, 111965 - including an Israeli citizen
                                       who is not a resident as mentioned, registered in the population registry;
                                     "Resident of an area" - a person who is registered in the population register of the area;
                                                           "Foreign resident" - a person who is not a resident;
             "Senior public position" - including head of state, president of a state, mayor, judge, member
             Parliament, senior party member, government member, senior military or police officer, subject

3117 Tunka Tsbokatsboka 8204 Tunka Tsbokat Knkata Tsbokt

Ministry of Justice Records Department, Doxcenter ID, 801-02-2019-000297: Received on 04/10/2019 -
A senior position in a government company, a senior position in an international organization, or any
                                fulfills the aforementioned position even if the title is different;
             "The Testimony Regulations" - The Testimony Regulations (photocopies), 121969-
                                 Chapter II: Identification duties
(a) An operator will not allow an operation to be performed for the first time, by a service recipient who is not 2. the customer's knowledge
Receives a service for a low amount, without having identified the service recipient and without performing a procedure regarding him
of knowing the client, according to his degree of risk for money laundering and terrorist financing; Operator will edit
                                             Records of customer identification information.
(b) Knowing the customer includes, among other things, ascertaining the source of the financial assets for which
The services, including the source of the credit given and the source of the credit repayment, as the case may be, its connection
To the borrower of the person who has committed to pay back the credit or who is seeking to pay back the credit
and he is not the borrower, or his relationship to the lender of the person to whom the credit is returned and he is not the lender,
According to the matter, the occupation of the recipient of the service, the purpose of the credit given and if previously refused acceptance
Service from any factor whatsoever for reasons related to the prohibition of money laundering and terrorist financing, regarding
A foreign resident - also ascertaining his connection to Israel as well as ascertaining whether he is a foreign public figure, in the case of a person
A foreign public that the operator has classified as high risk - also the source of its financial resources,
                                      And for those who own a business - also the type of business.
(c) In performing an action by a service recipient who does not receive a service for a low amount, who is a person
foreign public or in the case where the beneficiary is a foreign public figure, the operator will act according to these instructions:
(1) An operator will not allow an operation to be performed for the first time, unless it has been accepted
confirmation of this from an official in the operator; The granting of said approval will be assessed according to the degree of risk
                              of the service recipient for money laundering and terrorist financing;
(2) It became clear after performing an action that the recipient of the service or the beneficiary is a foreign public figure,
The operator will not allow another operation to be performed, with the exception of a loan repayment operation, until
                         To obtain permission from an official in the operator according to paragraph (.)1

                              Chapter III: Control and reporting duties
(a) An operator will monitor the actions of a service recipient who does not receive service in the amount of 11. Control
low, for the purpose of fulfilling his duties regarding identification, reporting and managing records according to the law and will check
Because the actions of the recipient of the service correspond to the nature of his normal activity according to his familiarity with
the recipient of the service, according to the level of risk of the recipient of the service for money laundering and terrorist financing;
                                  Without prejudice to the generality of the aforementioned, an operator will -
(1) Ongoing control of the customer recognition procedure performed by the recipient of the service, according to the extent
The service recipient's risk of money laundering and terrorist financing, and will update his records according to
this; Doubt arose about the identity of the recipient of the service or the authenticity of the identification documents provided
For the operator, the operator will perform a procedure of getting to know the customer once again according to the degree of risk
                                 The recipient of the service will update his records accordingly;
                                                       (2) Increased control -
(a) On activities carried out with countries and territories listed in the appendix
                                                 the first;
                                      on the activity of a foreign public figure; (b)
        On an activity that has a high risk of money laundering or terrorist financing. (c)
(b) For the purpose of fulfilling his obligations regarding identification, reporting and management of records according to the law, an operator
will maintain increased control over repeated activity of a service recipient for a low amount, including activity
     Listed in subsection (a)(2a) and (b), which raises concerns about money laundering or terrorist financing.
                      (a) An operator shall report to the competent authority on operations as detailed below: 12. Operator's report

(1) Transfer of financial assets to or from a service recipient, in an equivalent amount
For at least 50,000 new shekels and for credit granted in connection with the purchase of a property or
Service - in an amount equivalent to at least NIS 150,000; Regarding this section,
"Financial asset" - with the exception of a financial asset that requires a legal procedure, including spending procedures
                                                     to implement, to realize;
(2) Transfer of financial assets to or from a service recipient, in which a state is involved
or territory from the lists in the first supplement, in an amount equivalent to 5,000 shekels
                                                       new ones at least.
(b) An operator will report to the competent authority an action that he sees as unusual; to the point
This "action" - including an attempt to perform an action; Without prejudice to the generality of the said, they may see
             An action from the actions listed in the fourth appendix as an unusual action.
(c) The reporting of an action according to the provisions of subsection (a) does not exempt from reporting obligations according to
                                                               subsection (b).
(d) An operator shall report to the competent authority the activity of the recipient of the service on which he reported
to the Israel Police according to section (6a)(1) of the law, according to section (33a) of the law on the fight against terrorism or according to
                  Section 6 of the law to prevent the distribution and financing of weapons of mass destruction.

                                                                              (b) identity number;
                                                                                     (c) Maan;
                                                           (d) telephone numbers, up to two numbers;
                                               (e) facsimile number or email address;
                                                (f) name and identity number of the person verifying the details;
                    (g) The type of license and license number received by an operator according to the law on the supervision of services
                    regulated financial services, and if the aforementioned license is a basic license or an extended license according to
                                                                                   the same law;
                                                                     (2) Regarding the reported operation -
                                          (a) the date of the operation as registered with the operator;
                    (b) the amount of the operation in Israeli currency; In an operation in foreign currency, the amount of the operation will be calculated
                             According to the representative rate, published by the Bank of Israel, known on the day of the operation;
                              (c) the types of foreign currency in which the operation was performed and the amount in that currency;
                    (d) Credit details - guarantors, if any, and the serial number assigned by the operator
                                                                            to credit;
                                                   (e) the type of financial asset in which the operation is performed;
                    (f) If the operation is done using a credit card or bank card, also the type
                    The card, the card number if known or the last four digits of the card, the country
                        the issuer, as well as the name, identity number and account number of the card holder, if known;
                    (g) If the operation is done by check - also the account number and the details of the institution
                    on which each check is drawn, the identification details of the account holder, his address and telephone number
                    as they appear on the check, and the name of the person at whose command the check is drawn, if any; to report
                    A photocopy of the check on both sides will be attached; In case the payment was given by check,
                    The report will include all the details of the check given as consideration, including the name of the person under his command
                                                                    the check is drawn, if any;
                    (h) If the operation is done using a bill of exchange or promissory note - also the identity details
                    and the address of the maker of the note and the drawee, as they appear on the note; to report
                                A photocopied copy of the bill of exchange or promissory note on both sides will be attached;
                    (i) If the credit is given against a check of the borrower's right to receive a financial asset since -
                                        Also the identification details of the mentor and mentee, as detailed below:
                    (1) Referral details - name, ID number, address, phone numbers, recipient status
                    The service (resident/foreign resident/Israeli corporation/foreign corporation), country of issue
                     The identification document, for an individual - date of birth and sex, for a corporation - the date of incorporation;
                    (2) The internship details - name, identity number, address, for an individual - date of birth and gender,
                                                          For the corporation - the date of incorporation;

(j) An operation was performed through an electronic transfer - the name of the recipient will be included in the report
The service, its identity number and address, as well as the name of the transferor or transferee, as the case may be, number
his identity and address, if he is not the recipient of the service, the number of the financial institution, the number of the branch, number
the account at the financial institution to which the transfer is made, if any; But in action
In front of a financial institution in the country or territory listed in the first appendix -
The said details will be included in the report and regarding the name of the transferor or transferee, as the case may be,
                   his identity number and his account number at the financial institution, as provided;
(k) In the report according to section (12b) - the reason for the report will also be included, including the description of the action
that the report on all its circumstances has been submitted, and references for taking action will be attached to it;
A report according to section (12b) on an action performed by a service recipient will include the details
    required in paragraph (3) also regarding the execution of the operation, if they were in the possession of an operator;
                                                         (3) Regarding the recipient of the service -
                                                                   (a) name;
                                                             (b) identity number;
                                                                   (c) Maan;
                               (d) telephone numbers, up to two numbers, if known;
                     (e) for an individual - date of birth; For the corporation - the date of incorporation;
                                                            (f) for singular - species;
     (g) the status of the recipient of the service (resident/foreign resident/Israeli corporation/foreign corporation);
                                               (h) the country of issuance of the identification document;
(4) Regarding the beneficiaries and the controlling owners, if they exist, the details required according to section (3b) and (c).
(a) An operator shall not reveal the fact of its formation, existence, non-existence or content of a report according to 14. Prohibition of disclosure and review
Section (12b), and will not reveal the fact of the existence of a supplementary report as defined in Section (31c)
to the law, the fact of the existence of a request for such a report or the content of one of these, and
will not allow the provision of documents that testify to any of these; Despite the said, operator
will reveal information or allow such review to be given to those who are authorized to do so for the purpose of fulfilling their duties at
    the operator, to the supervisor or to whom he has authorized, to the competent authority or according to a court order.
(b) Doubt arose regarding the identity of the recipient of the service or the authenticity of the aforementioned identification documents
In section (11a), there was a fear of money laundering and terrorist financing as stated in section (11b), or
An activity that is predicted to be unusual has been carried out as stated in section (12b), and the operator believes that
Canceling exemptions or concessions according to section 10 or performing a control for the customer recognition procedure according to section
11, as the case may be, would lead to a violation of his duty according to subsection (a), he may not do so,
                                   and will report to the competent authority about the aforementioned concern.
                     Chapter 4: Checking identification details against lists
                                                  An operator will check against the lists - 15. Obligation to check against
                                                                                           in front of lists
(1) If they contain the name or identity number of a service recipient, proxy, beneficiary or owner
control whose details are found in the computerized database established according to section (17a); inspection
                      As mentioned, it will also be prepared whenever an organization or person is added to the lists;

                  (2) If they contain the names of parties to the action, with the exception of those listed in paragraph (;) 1
                                                                               In this paragraph -
                  "Operation" - the transfer of a financial asset from Israel to a foreign country or region, or the transfer of
                                           a financial asset outside the country or from the region to Israel;
                  "Party to the action" - anyone who is one of the parties to the action performed through the operator,
                  However, regarding an action done through a promissory note or check - the doer of the bill
                        or the drawee of the check, as the case may be, as well as the payee by bill or check, as the case may be.
                                                 Chapter 5: Miscellany
  An operator shall determine policy, tools and risk management regarding the prohibition of money laundering and terrorist financing Policy determination 16.
                                         For the purpose of fulfilling his obligations regarding this order, including in these matters:
                                        (1) a procedure for getting to know the customer, identification, reporting and record management;
                  (2) monitoring of money laundering and terrorist financing threats, arising, among other things, from technologies
                                Innovations, in particular those that allow transactions not to be carried out face to face.
   (a) An operator shall maintain a computerized database of all operations and identification and reporting information. Management of records 17.
       and their preservation required by this order of service recipients, power of attorneys, beneficiaries and those in control.
                  (b) An operator shall keep in an accessible manner the details of every financial operation carried out, including among other things
                  the date of the operation, the type of operation, the amount of the operation and the currency in which the operation was performed,
                  as well as the instruction document to perform an action and accompanying business correspondence between the operator
                  and the recipient of the service, and all for at least five years from the date the credit repayment ends;
                  Saving the documents will be done in a way that also allows the recovery of a single transaction; Regarding section
                  This is "business correspondence" - the action documents, instructions given in connection with the action during
                  The business contract, instructions regarding the terms of the contract and clarification regarding the recipient's activity
                                                                                   the service
                  (c) An operator shall keep any instruction document in connection with the performance of an action reported to the Authority
                                     authorized and the report itself, for the period as stated in subsection (b).
                  (d) Saving documents as stated in subsections (b) and (c) may be done through
                  Computerized scanning under the conditions specified in Regulation 3A of the Evidence Regulations; In the absence of a document
                  An instruction to perform an action as mentioned in those subsections, the operator will keep the record
                                            The mechanized one that indicates the giving of an instruction to perform the operation.
                  (e) An operator shall keep written documentation of the control procedure as stated in section 11 and of its findings
                                                           for the period as stated in subsection (b).
                  (f) Notwithstanding what is stated in subsections (b) to (e), the operator will keep the said documents
                  There even beyond a period of five years if the supervisor required him to do so, and this in cases
                  certain in which the aforementioned documents are required for the purpose of an investigation or for the purpose of supervising execution
                                                          The provisions of the law or the Law on Combating Terrorism.
  An operator shall deliver, upon request, to the supervisor or to whom the supervisor has authorized, documents, notices of document delivery, 18.
  and explanations regarding the fulfillment of his duties according to this order; The supervisor authorized a person who is not a civil servant to provide information and explanations
                     - That person shall be subject to a duty of confidentiality regarding documents, information and explanations provided to him.

                                                                    (section (12b))
                           A list of actions that can be seen as unusual actions according to the order
                       An activity that appears to be aimed at circumventing the reporting obligation established in section (12a); 1
                                                            Activity that appears to be aimed at circumventing the obligation to identify; 2
                                          An operation with a high financial scope and complexity, without a reasonable explanation; 3
                                            Performing an action by someone who does not receive service, without a reasonable explanation; 4
                                      It appears that the recipient of the service is acting on behalf of a beneficiary, without declaring it; 5
                                            It seems that the requested action is not typical for the recipient of the service; 6

records

                            The installation file
March 14, 2021 9267 A. in Nisan, 2021

    column
             Money Laundering Prohibition Order (obligations to identify, report and maintain records of credit service providers to prevent money laundering
    and terrorist financing) (amendment), HaTashfa 2608 ¸ ¸ ¸ ¸ ¸ 2021-




                                        Regulations file, 9267a in Nissan 3/14/2021,




                                                                                                                      10:47 14/03/21
Money Laundering Prohibition Order (obligations to identify, report and manage records of service providers
    Credit for the Prevention of Money Laundering and Terrorist Financing) (amendment), 2021-
1
 With authoritative force according to sections (7b) and (c) and (32c) of the Money Laundering Prohibition Law, 2000-
(hereinafter - the law), and according to section (95a) of the law on the fight against terrorism, 2566 (22016) - hereinafter - the law on the fight
in terrorism), after consultation with the Minister of Justice and the Minister of Internal Security, and regarding Chapter D,
With the consent of the Minister of Justice, and with the approval of the Constitution, Law and Justice Committee of the Knesset, I command to say:
In the Money Laundering Prohibition Order (obligations to identify, report and manage records of credit service providers. 1. Correcting the name
for the Prevention of Money Laundering and Terrorist Financing), 2018 (32018 - hereinafter - the main decree), in the name of the decree
the main one, instead of "obligations to identify, report and manage records of credit service providers
to prevent money laundering and terrorist financing) "import" (obligations to identify, report and maintain records of
  Financial asset service providers and credit service providers to prevent money laundering and terrorist financing)".
In the main decree, everywhere, except for the definition "credit service provider" in section 1, in section (3e). 2 Replacement of terms
                                                        and in section (20b) and (c) -
(1) Instead of "credit service provider", credit service provider shall mean their services
the "credit", the credit service provider" and "credit service provider" will mean the "service provider",

 in section 4 of the decree; In the matter of registering the identification detail of the account number

                                   of the recipient of the service.

"(b) A service provider shall keep in an accessible manner the details of any financial operation carried out within the framework
Providing the credit or providing the service in the financial asset, as the case may be, which will include, among other things,

                          The request to perform the operation is from the person who does not receive the service, without a reasonable explanation; 5

Haganah (time of emergency), 101945, or an organization that has been declared a terrorist organization according to the prevention order
Terrorism, 1948, 1111948 - or an organization that has been declared a terrorist organization according to Chapter B of the Law on Combating Terrorism,
              as well as an action that seems to be intended to take the place of an activity of such an organization;

                          in criminal activity, including "Dark Market" platforms

13:53, 3.11.2021 Money Laundering Prohibition Order (obligations to identify, report and manage records of financial asset service providers and credit service providers to prevent money laundering and terrorist financing), 2018...8-


                                                                                      The law is valid as of 11-14-2021:

         Money Laundering Prohibition Order (obligations to identify, report and maintain records of those issuing the order 2021-

       Financial asset service and credit service providers to prevent money laundering and financing
                             Terrorism), 2018-

Chapter A: Commentary

                                                                                                                    Chapter II: Identification duties

     With authoritative force according to sections (7b) and (c) and (32-c) of the Money Laundering Prohibition Law, 2000 (below) -
     the law), and section (95a) of the Law on the Fight against Terrorism, 556 (2016 - hereinafter - the Law on the Fight against Terrorism), after
     Consultation with the Minister of Justice and the Minister of Internal Security, and regarding Chapter D, with the consent of the Minister
                     Laws, and with the approval of the Knesset's Constitution, Law and Justice Committee, I command to say:



                                               Chapter A: Commentary

In this order - 1. Definitions
                                               "Zone" - any of these: Judea and Samaria and the Gaza Strip;
     "Foreign public figure" - a foreign resident who has held a senior public position abroad in the last five years,
     Including a family member of the aforementioned foreign resident or a corporation he controls, a consultant and a personal appointment
                                        of the foreign public figure or a business partner of one of these;
     "Treaty to Abolish the Verification Requirement" – a convention that abolishes the verification requirement for foreign certificates
     Publicity as defined by the Convention in the Regulations for the Implementation of the Hague Convention (elimination of verification of foreign public documents),
                                                                      1977; 1977-
     The "FATF" organization (Financial Action Task Force) - the force of the international task force for the fight against the 2021 TAFA order -
                                                        in money laundering and terrorist financing;
                                             "The Organization - "OECD - Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development; Decree 2021 -

     "Exchange" - a stock exchange or a regulated market as defined in the Law on Joint Investments Decree 2021-
                                                                 faithfully;
                                                          https://www.nevo.co.il/laws/#/604deb6a0f7d0e7d1f487c95/2021-11-14/versionTimeline 2/32
13:53, 3.11.2021 Money Laundering Prohibition Order (obligations to identify, report and manage records of financial asset service providers and credit service providers to prevent money laundering and terrorist financing), 2018...8-

                                           "Family member" - as defined in the Securities Law, 1968-
                                   "Instructions of the Commissioner" - instructions established by the Commissioner according to Section 113 of the Law; Order 2021-2021

          "The Civil Administration" - the Civil Administration established by the Commander of the IDF forces in the Judea and Samaria region;
                                                            "The supervisor" - as defined in section 11(a)(6) of the law;
                                                                                  The "lists" - each of these: Decree Tashfa 2021-

     A consolidated list of declared terrorist organizations and of those who have been declared active (1) Decree 2021-
     Terrorism, published in a notice according to Section 18 of the Law on Combating Terrorism, as well as an organization or person
     As stated, that the announcement of his declaration as a terrorist organization or as a person who is a terrorist operative was fabricated
     To the service provider in the manner established according to section 18 of the Law on Combating Terrorism, and the service provider
                                                  did not receive notification of its cancellation;
     The list of factors that have been declared to assist the distribution and financing of weapons of mass destruction (2) Order 2021-
     According to Sections 3 or 4 of the Law to Prevent the Distribution and Financing of Weapons of Mass Destruction,
                                                         2018; 2018-
                                             "Managing company" - as defined in the Law on the Supervision of Provident Funds; Order 2021-

                                    "The Banking (Licensing) Law" - The Banking (Licensing) Law, 1981-
                   "The Banking (Customer Service) Law" - The Banking (Customer Service) Law, 1981-
     "Regulated Financial Services Supervision Law" - Financial Services Supervision Law
                                         (Regulated Financial Services), 2016-
     "The Law on the Supervision of Provident Funds" - the Law on the Supervision of Financial Services (Provident Funds), Order 2021-2021
                                                                2005-
        "Law on Joint Investments in Trust" - Law on Joint Investments in Trust, 2014; 1994- Decree 2021-

                                          "Payment Services Law" - Payment Services Law, 2019- 2021

"Individual" - a person who is not a corporation, or is not a public institution or is not a corporation established by legislation abroad
                                                                             to the country;
           "Credit card" - as defined in section 25j of the Law on the Supervision of Regulated Financial Services;
     "Bank card" - as defined in section 59 of the Payment Services Law, including a card issued by a corporation Order 2021-
                                                        except that it is a bank in a foreign country;
     "Wallet address of a virtual currency" - a string of characters that indicates the holder of a virtual currency, Decree 2021-
                                      used by the service provider as part of an action;
                                        "Maged" - as defined in Section 7B of the Banking Law (customer service);
               "Insurer" - as defined in the Law on the Supervision of Financial Services (Insurance), 1981- Decree 2021-

     "Financial institution" - an entity required to report according to section 7 of the law as well as an entity incorporated outside of Israel that provides
     Services of the type provided by entities required to report according to section 7 of the law or acting as a bank
                                                             for investments or as a clearinghouse;
     "Public institution" - government ministries, the Jewish Agency for Palestine, local authorities and so on

     "Power of attorney" - the person who receives the service has given his power to act on his behalf, regardless of whether he is the recipient of the service

     for which the services are provided, including the source of the credit repayment and the affiliation of the recipient of the 2021-
     the credit to the person who has committed to repay the credit or the person who seeks to repay the credit,
     The occupation of the recipient of the service, the purpose of the credit given or the service in a financial asset, according to
     the matter, and if in the past she refused to accept credit or receive service in a financial asset, as the case may be,
     From any factor whatsoever for reasons related to the prohibition of money laundering and terrorist financing, regarding a foreign resident -

     The service classified him at a high risk level - also the source of his financial resources, and regarding who he is

     who carried out a process of knowing the client, according to his degree of risk for money laundering and financing

‫הפרטים כאמור – לפי אישור של עורך דין; נותן שירות יקבל לידיו מסמך‬
     ‫המעיד על רישומו של התאגיד ומסמכים כמפורט בפסקה (‪ ;)3‬בתאגיד‬
     ‫שהתאגד במדינה שלא מתקיים בה רישום לגבי תאגידים מסוגו‪ ,‬יקבל לידיו‬
     ‫נותן השירות אישור של עורך דין על כך שלא קיים רישום במדינת ההתאגדות;‬
       ‫לעניין אימות‪ ,‬נותן השירות ישמור מסמכים אלה או העתקים מצולמים שלהם;‬
     ‫לעניין רישום פרטי הזיהוי כאמור בסעיף ‪(3‬א)(‪ )1‬של מקבל שירות שהוא מוסד‬                               ‫(‪)5‬‬                        ‫צו תשפ"א‪2021-‬‬
     ‫ציבורי או תאגיד שהוקם בחיקוק בחוץ לארץ – לפי הצהרת מקבל השירות‪,‬‬
     ‫ובתאגיד שהוקם בחיקוק – לפי העתק שיקבל נותן השירות מן החיקוק שמכוחו‬
     ‫הוקם התאגיד‪ ,‬או אישור של עורך דין על קיומו של החיקוק; נותן שירות יקבל‬
     ‫לידיו מסמכים כמפורט בפסקה (‪ ;)3‬לעניין אימות‪ ,‬נותן השירות ישמור‬
                                     ‫מסמכים אלה או העתקים מצולמים שלהם;‬
     ‫לעניין פרטי הזיהוי כאמור בסעיף ‪(3‬א)(‪ )1‬עד (‪ )4‬של מקבל שירות שנחזה‬                                  ‫(‪)6‬‬                        ‫צו תשפ"א‪2021-‬‬
     ‫בעיני נותן השירות להיות מי שחייב ברישיון מכוח חוק הפיקוח על שירותים‬
     ‫פיננסיים מוסדרים – ידרוש נותן השירות גם העתק מהרישיון שניתן למקבל‬
     ‫השירות לפי סעיף ‪ 12‬לחוק הפיקוח על שירותים פיננסיים מוסדרים‪ ,‬או יאמת‬
     ‫את פרטי מקבל השירות אל מול המרשמים של נותני שירותים פיננסיים‬
     ‫כמשמעותם בסעיף ‪5‬א לחוק האמור‪ ,‬או ידרוש ממנו הצהרה בכתב כי אינו‬

     ‫לעניין פרטי זיהוי כאמור בסעיף ‪(3‬א)(‪ )1‬עד (‪ )4‬של מקבל שירות שהוא קטין‬                               ‫(‪)7‬‬                        ‫צו תשפ"א‪2021-‬‬
     ‫שטרם מלאו לו ‪ 16‬שנים או מי שמונה לו אפוטרופוס – לפי מסמך זיהוי של‬
     ‫אחד מאפוטרופסיו; אם האפוטרופוס תושב חוץ – לפי דרכונו של הקטין או לפי‬

     ‫המחייבת זיהוי לקוחות לעניין אימות לפי מסמך זיהוי כאמור; נותן השירות‬

     ‫(א‪ )1‬על אף האמור בסעיף קטן (א)‪ ,‬רשאי הממונה לתת הוראות לעניין אמצעים חלופיים‬                                                  ‫צו תשפ"א‪2021-‬‬

     ‫לעניין מיופה כוח‪ ,‬יקבל לידיו נותן שירות גם העתק של כתב ייפוי כוח‪ ,‬כתב נאמנות‬                               ‫(ב)‬                ‫צו תשפ"א‪2021-‬‬
     ‫או החלטת האורגן המוסמך בתאגיד‪ ,‬לפי העניין‪ ,‬מאת מקבל השירות המסמיך את‬
     ‫מיופה הכוח לפעול מטעמו‪ ,‬הכולל את כל פרטי הזיהוי של מקבל השירות; העתק‬
        ‫כתב ייפוי הכוח‪ ,‬כתב הנאמנות או ההחלטה‪ ,‬לפי העניין‪ ,‬יישמר אצל נותן השירות‪.‬‬
     ‫נותן שירות ישמור את מסמכי הזיהוי באורח נגיש לתקופה של חמש שנים לפחות‬                                       ‫(ג)‬                ‫צו תשפ"א‪2021-‬‬
     ‫ממועד סיום החזר האשראי או מתן השירות בנכס הפיננסי‪ ,‬לפי העניין‪ ,‬או לתקופה‬
     ‫ארוכה יותר אם הממונה דרש ממנו לעשות כן במקרים מסוימים שבהם מסמכי‬
     ‫הזיהוי נדרשים לצורך חקירה או לשם פיקוח על ביצוע הוראות החוק; שמירת מסמכי‬
     ‫הזיהוי‪ ,‬יכול שתיעשה באמצעות סריקה ממוחשבת בתנאים המפורטים בתקנה ‪3‬א‬
     ‫לתקנות העדות; לעניין זה‪" ,‬מסמכי זיהוי" – כל מסמך שנמסר לצורך זיהוי ואימות‪,‬‬
     ‫לרבות הצהרה שניתנה לפי צו זה ומסמכים עיקריים ששימשו את נותן השירות‬
                                                     ‫להכרת הלקוח לפי סעיף ‪(2‬א)‪.‬‬
     ‫נותן שירות ינקוט אמצעים סבירים‪ ,‬לפי רמת הסיכון להלבנת הון ולמימון טרור‪,‬‬                                    ‫(ד)‬                ‫צו תשפ"א‪2021-‬‬
     ‫לאימות פרטי הזיהוי של נהנה ובעל שליטה‪ ,‬לפי העניין‪ ,‬בהתקשרות כאמור בסעיף‬
     ‫‪(3‬ב) ו‪(-‬ג); לעניין זה‪" ,‬נקיטת אמצעים סבירים" – שימוש במידע הנוגע לעניין או‬
                   ‫בנתונים שהתקבלו ממקור מהימן המניחים את דעתו של נותן השירות‪.‬‬

                                       Chapter III: Control and reporting duties


     A service provider will monitor the actions of a service recipient, who does not receive an occasional service, for the purpose of (a). 10 Control
     Fulfilling his duties regarding identification, reporting and managing records according to the law and will check that the actions of the recipient of the 2021-2021 order
     The service is consistent with the nature of his normal activity according to his familiarity with the recipient of the service,
     And this according to the risk level of the recipient of the service for money laundering and terrorist financing; without harming
                                               In the generality of the said, a service provider shall -
                                                                                                                                   Order 2021-

13:53, 3.11.2021 Money Laundering Prohibition Order (obligations to identify, report and manage records of financial asset service providers and credit service providers to prevent money laundering and terrorist financing), 2018...8-

Ongoing control of the process of knowing the customer performed by the recipient of the service, according to the measure (1).
                         The service recipient's risk of money laundering and terrorist financing, and will update his records according to
                         this; Doubt arose about the identity of the recipient of the service or the authenticity of the identification documents
                         delivered to the service provider, the service provider will perform a procedure of getting to know the customer one more time
                         according to the degree of risk of the recipient of the service and will update his records accordingly; Concern arose
                         For money laundering or terrorist financing regarding actions performed by the recipient of the service, a provider will request
                         The service provides the service recipient with information and explanations regarding those operations, if necessary
                         Also references that support the information and explanations he provided, and will update the recognition records

                                               ‫"אזור" – כל אחד מאלה‪ :‬יהודה והשומרון ורצועת עזה;‬
     ‫"איש ציבור זר" – תושב חוץ בעל תפקיד ציבורי בכיר בחוץ לארץ‪ ,‬לרבות בן משפחה של‬
     ‫תושב חוץ כאמור או תאגיד המצוי בשליטתו או שותף עסקי של תושב חוץ כאמור; לעניין‬
     ‫זה‪" ,‬תפקיד ציבורי בכיר" – לרבות ראש מדינה‪ ,‬נשיא מדינה‪ ,‬ראש עיר‪ ,‬שופט‪ ,‬חבר‬
     ‫פרלמנט‪ ,‬חבר ממשלה וקצין צבא או משטרה בכיר‪ ,‬או כל ממלא תפקיד כאמור‪ ,‬אף אם‬
                                                                       ‫תוארו שונה;‬
                                       ‫"בן משפחה" – כהגדרתו בחוק ניירות ערך‪ ,‬התשכ"ח‪;1968-‬‬
                                              ‫"הממונה" – הרשם אשר מונה לפי סעיף ‪11‬ב(א) לחוק;‬
                                                    ‫"הרשות המוסמכת" – כהגדרתה בסעיף ‪ 29‬לחוק;‬
     ‫"הרשימה" – רשימה מרוכזת של ארגוני טרור מוכרזים ושל מי שהוכרז אדם שהוא פעיל‬
     ‫טרור‪ ,‬שפורסמה בהודעה לפי סעיף ‪ 18‬לחוק המאבק בטרור; וכן ארגון או אדם כאמור‪,‬‬
     ‫שהודעה על הכרזתו כארגון טרור או כאדם שהוא פעיל טרור הומצאה לנותן שירותי מטבע‬
     ‫בדרך שנקבעה לפי סעיף ‪ 18‬לחוק המאבק בטרור‪ ,‬ונותן שירותי המטבע לא קיבל הודעה‬
                                                                        ‫על ביטולה;‬
     ‫"יחיד" – מי שאינו תאגיד‪ ,‬או שאינו מוסד ציבורי או שאינו תאגיד שהוקם בחיקוק בחוץ‬
                                                                             ‫לארץ;‬
     ‫"מוסד ציבורי" – משרדי הממשלה‪ ,‬הסוכנות היהודית לארץ ישראל‪ ,‬רשויות מקומיות וכן‬
                              ‫רשויות‪ ,‬תאגידים או מוסדות אחרים שהוקמו בישראל בחיקוק;‬
                              ‫"מורשה חתימה" – מי שבעל חשבון ייפה את כוחו לפעול בחשבונו;‬
                                                                                                ‫"מספר זהות" –‬
                               ‫ביחיד שהוא תושב – מספר זהותו במרשם האוכלוסין;‬                            ‫(‪)1‬‬
     ‫ביחיד שהוא תושב חוץ – מספר דרכון או מספר תעודת מסע ושם המדינה‬                                      ‫(‪)2‬‬
     ‫שבה הוצא הדרכון או תעודת המסע; היה היחיד תושב אזור‪ ,‬מספר הזהות יכול‬
                  ‫שיהיה גם מספר זהותו בכרטיס מגנטי שהנפיק המינהל האזרחי;‬
                     ‫בתאגיד הרשום בישראל – מספר הרישום במרשם המתאים;‬                                    ‫(‪)3‬‬
     ‫בתאגיד שאינו רשום בישראל – מספר הרישום במדינת ההתאגדות‪ ,‬אם קיים‪,‬‬                                   ‫(‪)4‬‬
     ‫ושמה‪ ,‬ואם לא קיים רישום לתאגידים מסוגו – הפרטים הרשומים במסמך‬
       ‫ההתאגדות של התאגיד או מספר הרישום הפנימי אצל נותן שירותי המטבע;‬
     ‫במוסד ציבורי ובתאגיד שהוקם בחיקוק בחוץ לארץ – מספר הרישום שיקצה לו‬                                 ‫(‪)5‬‬
                                                     ‫נותן שירותי המטבע;‬
                                                                                     ‫"מען" – כל אחד מאלה‪:‬‬
     ‫ביחיד – מענו הרשום במסמך כאמור בסעיף ‪(4‬א) או מקום מגוריו‪ ,‬כפי שמסר‪,‬‬                                ‫(‪)1‬‬
     ‫הכולל את שם היישוב‪ ,‬וכן את שם הרחוב‪ ,‬מספר הבית והמיקוד‪ ,‬אם נתונים‬
                                    ‫אלה קיימים‪ ,‬ובתושב חוץ – גם שם המדינה;‬
     ‫בתאגיד – מענו הרשום במסמך כאמור בסעיף ‪(4‬א)(‪ )3‬או מקום ניהול עסקיו‬                                  ‫(‪)2‬‬
     ‫בישראל‪ ,‬ואם אינו מנהל עסקים בישראל – מקום מרכז עסקיו מחוץ לישראל‪,‬‬
     ‫וכל אלה – כפי שמסר; המען יכלול את שם היישוב‪ ,‬וכן את שם הרחוב‪ ,‬מספר‬
                   ‫הבית ומיקוד‪ ,‬ובתאגיד שאינו רשום בישראל – גם שם המדינה;‬
     ‫במוסד ציבורי ובתאגיד בחוץ לארץ שהוקם בחיקוק – המען שמסרו הכולל את‬                                  ‫(‪)3‬‬
     ‫שם היישוב וכן את שם הרחוב‪ ,‬מספר הבית ומיקוד‪ ,‬אם נתונים אלה קיימים‪,‬‬
                         ‫ובתאגיד בחוץ לארץ שהוקם בחיקוק – גם שם המדינה;‬
     ‫"מבקש שירות" – מי שמבקש שירות מנותן שירותי מטבע‪ ,‬בין בעבור עצמו ובין בעבור‬
                                                                           ‫אחר;‬
     ‫"מקבל שירות" – מי שמקבל שירות מנותן שירותי מטבע‪ ,‬לרבות נותן שירותי מטבע כאמור‬
        ‫בפסקה (‪ )6‬להגדרה "נותן שירותי מטבע"‪ ,‬אף אם אדם אחר ביקש את השירות בעבורו;‬
                                                                  ‫"מקבל שירות קבוע" – כל אחד מאלה‪:‬‬
     ‫מקבל שירות שבוצעו בעבורו‪ ,‬במהלך ששת החודשים שקדמו לביצוע הפעולה‪,‬‬                                   ‫(‪)1‬‬

some operations, with an aggregate amount of NIS 50,000 or more; or the action

                                                        https://www.nevo.co.il/laws/#/604deb6a0f7d0e7d1f487c95/2021-11-14/versionTimeline 20/32
13:53, 3.11.2021 Money Laundering Prohibition Order (obligations to identify, report and manage records of financial asset service providers and credit service providers to prevent money laundering and terrorist financing), 2018...8-

that he requests completes the sum of the actions that preceded it in the said period of time
                                       to NIS 50,000 or more;
     A service recipient who requests from the currency service provider a service in the amount of 50,000 shekels () 2
                                                        new and older;
     A recipient of a service who has notified the currency service provider in writing that he wishes to be a recipient () 3
                                                            permanent service;
     A service recipient who provides currency services defined him as a regular service recipient and informed him (4).
                                                                  about that;
     A service recipient who receives currency services as stated in paragraph (6) for the definition of "service provider (5)
                                                               currency";
     In a corporation that is one of the subscribers in paragraphs (1) to (5) - an officer in the corporation, (6)
     as well as anyone whom the corporation has informed the currency service provider that he is authorized to act on its behalf;
                                                             "office holder" - as defined in section 11a of the law;
                     "Currency service provider" - a person engaged in providing one of the services listed below:
                             Exchange of one country's currency for another country's currency; () 1
                             Sale or redemption of traveler's checks in any type of currency; (2)
     Receiving financial assets in one country against placing financial assets in another country (3).
     otherwise; For this matter, "financial assets" - cash, traveler's checks, checks, bills
              Exchange, promissory notes, negotiable securities, credit or financial deposits;
                                                                 Exchange of banknotes and currency; () 4
                                                      Discounting bags, bills of exchange and promissory notes; (5)
                   Discount services as defined in section 7a of the Banking Law (customer service); (6)
                                                       Delivery of financial assets against currency; (7)
     Delivery of financial assets to a person against the verification of that person's right to receive assets (8).
                                                         financial late;
     "Lawyer" - holder of a license to practice law in Israel, and in the case of a corporation that is not registered in Israel, as well
     A notary who is a lawyer with a license in a country that is a member of the OECD organization - or a notary who is an editor
     A lawyer licensed to practice law in the corporation's states of incorporation, provided that the state or
                               The territory where the corporation is incorporated is not listed in the first annex;
                                          "Action" – a single action except if otherwise stipulated in this addendum;
     "Parties to the operation" - each of the parties to the operation carried out through the currency service provider;
     and regarding promissory notes and checks - the maker of the note or the drawee of the check, as the case may be, as well as the payee in the note or
                                                                    In check, as the case may be;
                                                                                        "Name" - any of these:
         In the singular - surname and first name, which are listed in the identification document as stated in section 4 (1)
     In the corporation - its registered name, and if incorporated in a country where there is no registration of () 2
                                      Corporations of its type - name as provided;
         In a corporation established by legislation - the name established by legislation, both in Israel and abroad; (3)
                    In a public institution, with the exception of a corporation established by legislation - its name as given; (4)
                                                                                    "Corporation" - any of these:
     Company, partnership, cooperative association, Ottoman association, association or party (1)
                                                   registered in Israel;
                                                         A body registered as a corporation outside of Israel; (2)
     A body incorporated in a country where there is no registration of bodies of its type, provided that it presented () 3
                                              a document indicating that it is a corporation;

"Resident" - as defined in the Population Registry Law, 1965, including an Israeli citizen who is not
                                              such resident, registered in the population register;

13:53, 3.11.2021 Money Laundering Prohibition Order (obligations to identify, report and manage records of financial asset service providers and credit service providers to prevent money laundering and terrorist financing), 2018...8-

                                           "Resident of an area" - a person registered in the population register of the area;
                                                                             "Foreign resident" - a person who is not a resident.

‫נותן שירותי מטבע לא ייתן למקבל שירות קבוע שירותי מטבע ביחס לפעולות‬                                         ‫(א)‬      ‫‪.2‬‬         ‫הכרת הלקוח‬
     ‫החייבות בדיווח‪ ,‬כמפורט בסעיף ‪(8‬א)‪ ,‬בלא שזיהה את מקבל השירות‪ ,‬ובלא שביצע‬
     ‫לגביו‪ ,‬פעם אחת לפחות‪ ,‬הליך של הכרת הלקוח‪ ,‬לפי מידת הסיכון שלו להלבנת הון‬
     ‫ומימון טרור; לעניין זה‪" ,‬הליך של הכרת הלקוח" – בין השאר‪ ,‬בירור מקור הכספים‬
     ‫שלגביהם ניתנים השירותים‪ ,‬עיסוקו ומטרת השירותים; לגבי תושב חוץ – גם זיקתו‬
     ‫לישראל ואם הוא איש ציבור זר; לגבי מי שהוא בעל עסק – גם סוג עסקיו; נותן‬
                   ‫שירותי המטבע יערוך רישומים של פרטים אלה כפי שיורה לו הממונה‪.‬‬
     ‫נותן שירותי מטבע לא ייתן שירותי מטבע לאיש ציבור זר‪ ,‬בסכום העולה על הסכום‬                                   ‫(ב)‬
     ‫הקבוע בסעיף ‪(8‬א)‪ ,‬אלא אם כן התקבל אישור לכך מנושא משרה אצל נותן שירותי‬
     ‫המטבע‪ ,‬לרבות מי שכפוף ישירות למנהל הכללי; מתן אישור כאמור ייבחן לפי מידת‬
     ‫הסיכון של הלקוח להלבנת הון ומימון טרור; התברר במהלך ההתקשרות כי לקוח‬
     ‫הוא איש ציבור זר‪ ,‬לא יבצע נותן שירותי המטבע פעולה עד לקבלת אישור כאמור‬
                                                            ‫להמשך ההתקשרות‪.‬‬
     ‫בירור זיקתו של תושב חוץ לישראל והאם הוא איש ציבור זר‪ ,‬יכול שייעשה לפי טופס‬                                 ‫(ג)‬
                                                               ‫א' שבנספח השני‪.‬‬
     ‫נותן שירותי מטבע יבצע בקרה שוטפת בהתייחס להליך של הכרת הלקוח שביצע‬                                         ‫(ד)‬
     ‫למקבל שירות קבוע לפי מידת הסיכון של מקבל השירות להלבנת הון ולמימון טרור‪,‬‬
     ‫ויעדכן את רישומיו לפי זה; התעורר ספק ביחס לזהות מקבל שירות קבוע או‬
     ‫לאמיתות מסמכי הזיהוי שנמסרו לנותן שירותי המטבע‪ ,‬יבצע נותן שירותי המטבע‬
                                                ‫הליך של הכרת הלקוח פעם נוספת‪.‬‬
     ‫נותן שירותי מטבע אשר אינו מחויב בהקמת מאגר מידע ממוחשב‪ ,‬לפי סעיף ‪(13‬א)‪,‬‬                                    ‫(ה)‬
     ‫יבדוק‪ ,‬אחת לשישה חודשים‪ ,‬מי הם מקבלי השירות הקבועים שנוספו ללקוחותיו‬
     ‫בששת החודשים שקדמו למועד הבדיקה‪ ,‬בכל סניפיו‪ ,‬ויבצע ביחס אליהם הליך של‬
                                                                ‫הכרת הלקוח‪.‬‬
     ‫ליישום סעיף זה‪ ,‬רשאי נותן שירותי מטבע לפעול לפי טופס ב' שבנספח השני ולפי‬                                    ‫(ו)‬
     ‫הנוהל שבנספח השלישי; נותן שירותי המטבע רשאי לקבוע נהלים נוספים לצורך‬
                                                   ‫יישום החובות לפי תוספת זו‪.‬‬
     ‫נותן שירותי מטבע לא ייתן שירותי מטבע בסכום העולה על ‪ 10,000‬שקלים חדשים‬                                     ‫(א)‬      ‫רישום פרטי הזיהוי ‪.3‬‬
     ‫אם הפעולה מתבצעת במזומן‪ ,‬בסכום העולה על ‪ 50,000‬שקלים חדשים אם‬
     ‫הפעולה אינה מתבצעת במזומן‪ ,‬ומול מדינה או טריטוריה מן המנויות בנספח‬
     ‫הראשון בסכום העולה על ‪ 5,000‬שקלים חדשים‪ ,‬בלא שירשום לגבי מבקש השירות‪,‬‬
     ‫ובפעולות לפי סעיף ‪(8‬א) גם לגבי מקבל השירות‪ ,‬את פרטי הזיהוי המפורטים להלן‬
                                          ‫על פי מסמך הנושא תמונה ומספר זהות‪:‬‬
                                                                                              ‫שם;‬       ‫(‪)1‬‬
                                                                                    ‫מספר זהות;‬          ‫(‪)2‬‬
                                                                   ‫ביחיד – תאריך לידה ומין;‬             ‫(‪)3‬‬
                                                               ‫בתאגיד – תאריך התאגדות;‬                  ‫(‪)4‬‬
                                                                                              ‫מען‪.‬‬      ‫(‪)5‬‬
     ‫לא יעשה נותן שירותי מטבע פעולה של העברה אלקטרונית מישראל לחוץ לארץ‬                                         ‫(ב)‬
     ‫בסכום העולה על ‪ 5,000‬שקלים חדשים בלא שירשום‪ ,‬בכל אחד ממסמכי ההעברה‪,‬‬
     ‫את פרטי מקבל השירות יוזם ההעברה‪ ,‬לרבות שמו‪ ,‬מענו ומספר זהותו וכן את פרטי‬
     ‫הנעבר‪ ,‬לרבות שמו‪ ,‬מענו‪ ,‬ומספר זהותו‪ ,‬אם פרטים אלה ידועים לו; לעניין זה‪,‬‬
     ‫"העברה" – קבלת נכסים פיננסיים במדינה אחת כנגד העמדת נכסים פיננסיים‬
              ‫במדינה אחרת‪ ,‬כאמור בפסקה (‪ )3‬להגדרה "נותן שירותי מטבע" שבסעיף ‪.1‬‬
     ‫גם בפעולה של העברה אלקטרונית מחוץ לארץ אל ישראל בסכום העולה על ‪5,000‬‬                                       ‫(ג)‬
     ‫שקלים חדשים‪ ,‬ירשום נותן שירותי המטבע את פרטי יוזם ההעברה‪ ,‬לרבות שמו‪,‬‬
     ‫מענו ומספר זהותו‪ ,‬אם פרטים אלה ידועים לו‪ ,‬וכן את פרטי מקבל השירות הנעבר‪,‬‬
     ‫לרבות שמו‪ ,‬מענו ומספר זהותו; לעניין זה‪" ,‬העברה" – קבלת נכסים פיננסיים‬

13:53, 3.11.2021 Money Laundering Prohibition Order (obligations to identify, report and manage records of financial asset service providers and credit service providers to prevent money laundering and terrorist financing), 2018...8-

‫במדינה אחרת כנגד העמדת נכסים פיננסיים במדינה אחרת‪ ,‬כאמור בפסקה (‪)3‬‬
                                       ‫להגדרה "נותן שירותי מטבע" שבסעיף ‪.1‬‬
     ‫על אף האמור בסעיפים קטנים (א) עד (ג)‪ ,‬נותן שירותי מטבע שהקים מאגר מידע‬                                     ‫(ד)‬
     ‫ממוחשב לפי סעיף ‪ – 13‬בין אם הוא מחויב בהקמת המאגר לפי סעיף ‪(13‬א) ובין‬
     ‫אם אינו מחויב בכך לפי הסעיף האמור – רשאי שלא לרשום את פרטי הזיהוי של‬
     ‫מקבל שירות קבוע‪ ,‬בעת מתן שירות מטבע כאמור בסעיפים קטנים (א) עד (ג)‪ ,‬אם‬
     ‫ביצע למקבל השירות הקבוע הליך של הכרת הלקוח לפי סעיף ‪ 2‬ורשם את פרטי‬
                                                    ‫הזיהוי שלו פעם אחת לפחות‪.‬‬
     ‫בפעולה ששווייה עולה על ‪ 50,000‬שקלים חדשים‪ ,‬ובפעולה מול מדינה או טריטוריה‬                                   ‫(א)‬      ‫‪.4‬‬        ‫אימות פרטים‬
     ‫מן המנויות בנספח הראשון ששווייה עולה על ‪ 5,000‬שקלים חדשים‪ ,‬יאמת נותן‬                                                       ‫ודרישת מסמכים‬
     ‫שירותי מטבע את פרטי הזיהוי הנדרשים כאמור בסעיף ‪ 3‬ויקבל לידיו מסמכים‪,‬‬
                                                                 ‫כמפורט להלן‪:‬‬
     ‫במבקש שירות או מקבל שירות שהוא תושב‪ ,‬לעניין רישום פרטי הזיהוי בסעיף‬                                ‫(‪)1‬‬
     ‫‪(3‬א)(‪ )1‬עד (‪ – )3‬תעודת זהות או העתק מאושר שלה‪ ,‬שהעתק מצולם של‬
     ‫אחד מהם – בכל הנוגע לפרטי הזיהוי האמורים‪ ,‬יישמר אצל נותן שירותי‬
     ‫מטבע; נותן שירותי המטבע ישווה את פרטי הזיהוי עם מסמך נוסף הנושא‬
     ‫תמונה ומספר זהות‪ ,‬ובהעדרו – עם מסמך הנושא שם או מספר זהות וכן מען‬
     ‫או תאריך לידה‪ ,‬ובהעדרו – עם כרטיס אשראי; לעניין פסקה זו יראו כתעודת‬
     ‫זהות גם תעודת עולה עד ‪ 30‬ימים מיום הנפקתה‪ ,‬דרכון ישראלי תקף שניתן‬
     ‫לפי חוק הדרכונים‪ ,‬התשי"ב‪ ,1952-‬ורישיון נהיגה תקף‪ ,‬הכולל את תמונת בעל‬
                                           ‫הרישיון‪ ,‬שניתן לפי פקודת התעבורה;‬
     ‫במבקש שירות או מקבל שירות שהוא תושב חוץ לעניין רישום פרטי הזיהוי‬                                   ‫(‪)2‬‬
     ‫בסעיף ‪(3‬א)(‪ )1‬עד (‪ – )3‬דרכון חוץ או תעודת מסע‪ ,‬או העתק מאושר של‬
     ‫מסמך זיהוי כאמור‪ ,‬שהעתק מצולם שלהם בכל הנוגע לפרטי הזיהוי‪ ,‬יישמר‬
     ‫אצל נותן שירותי המטבע; נותן שירותי המטבע ישווה את פרטי הזיהוי עם‬
     ‫מסמך נוסף הנושא תמונה ומספר זהות‪ ,‬ובהעדרו – עם כרטיס אשראי; היה‬
     ‫היחיד תושב האזור‪ ,‬רשאי נותן שירותי מטבע לרשום את פרטי הזיהוי גם על פי‬
     ‫כרטיס מגנטי שהונפק על ידי המינהל האזרחי‪ ,‬שהעתק מצולם שלו‪ ,‬ככל הנוגע‬
     ‫לפרטי הזיהוי האמורים‪ ,‬יישמר אצל נותן שירותי המטבע; נותן שירותי המטבע‬
     ‫ישווה את פרטי הזיהוי עם מסמך נוסף כאמור לעניין תושב חוץ או יאמת את‬
     ‫פרטי הזיהוי עם תעודה רשמית המונפקת על ידי משרד הפנים‪ ,‬וישמור תיעוד‬
                                                               ‫של בדיקה זו;‬
     ‫במקבל שירות שהוא תאגיד – תעודת הרישום או העתק מאושר שלה‪ ,‬נסח‬                                       ‫(‪)3‬‬
     ‫עדכני של פרטי החברה מרשם החברות‪ ,‬או אישור של עורך דין על קיום‬
     ‫התאגיד‪ ,‬שמו‪ ,‬מספר זהותו ותאריך ההתאגדות שלו; בתאגיד שהואגד במדינה‬
     ‫שלא מתקיים בה רישום של תאגידים מסוגו‪ ,‬יקבל לידיו נותן שירותי המטבע‬
     ‫אישור של עורך דין על כך שלא קיים רישום במדינת ההתאגדות; נותן שירותי‬
              ‫מטבע יקבל לידיו וישמור מסמכים אלה או העתקים מצולמים שלהם‪:‬‬
     ‫העתק מאושר מתעודת הרישום של התאגיד‪ ,‬אישור של עורך דין על‬                                   ‫(‪)1‬‬
     ‫קיום התאגיד‪ ,‬שמו‪ ,‬מספר זהותו ותאריך ההתאגדות שלו‪ ,‬או נסח עדכני‬
                                     ‫של פרטי החברה מרשם החברות;‬
     ‫בתאגיד שהואגד במדינה שלא מתקיים בה רישום של תאגידים מסוגו –‬                                ‫(‪)2‬‬
                ‫אישור עורך דין על כך שלא קיים רישום במדינת ההתאגדות;‬
             ‫במבקש שירות שאינו מקבל השירות לעניין רישום פרטי הזיהוי שבסעיף‬                              ‫(‪)4‬‬
     ‫‪(3‬א)(‪ )1‬עד (‪ – )4‬העתק של כתב ייפוי כוח‪ ,‬כתב נאמנות או החלטת האורגן‬
     ‫המוסמך בתאגיד‪ ,‬לפי העניין‪ ,‬מאת מקבל השירות המסמיך את מבקש‬
     ‫השירות לקבל את שירות המטבע בעבורו‪ ,‬הכולל את כל פרטי הזיהוי של‬
     ‫מקבל השירות; העתק כתב ייפוי הכוח‪ ,‬כתב הנאמנות או ההחלטה‪ ,‬לפי‬
     ‫העניין‪ ,‬יישמר אצל נותן שירותי המטבע; היה מקבל השירות תאגיד יכללו כתב‬
     ‫ייפוי הכוח‪ ,‬כתב הנאמנות או החלטת האורגן המוסמך בתאגיד‪ ,‬לפי העניין‪,‬‬
     ‫פרטי זיהוי כאמור בסעיף ‪(3‬א)(‪ )1‬עד (‪ )4‬של כל בעלי השליטה; האמור‬
     ‫בפסקה זו לעניין רישום פרטי הזיהוי של בעלי השליטה לא יחול על תאגיד‬
     ‫שניירות הערך שלו נסחרים בבורסה לניירות ערך בישראל או במדינה אחרת‪,‬‬

                                        Chapter III: Control and reporting duties

A currency service provider will maintain ongoing control over the operations of a regular service recipient for the purpose of fulfilling 7. Control of activity
                          His duties according to this addendum, in accordance with the provisions of the procedure in the third appendix, receives permanent service
                    A provider of currency services shall report to the authorized authority on operations as detailed below: (a) 8. Reporting by a provider
                                                                                                                                     Currency services
     Providing currency services as stated in paragraphs (1) to (7), (5) and (8) - for the definition of "provider (1)
     Currency services" in section - 1 if the value of the service provided is 50,000 shekels
                                                         at least new;
     Providing currency services as stated in paragraph (6) to the definition of "currency services provider" in paragraph (2).
     - 1 If the value of the service provided or if the value of using a single debit card is
                                            50,000 new shekels at least;
     Providing currency services as stated in paragraphs (3) and (5) to (8) for the definition of "service provider" (3)
     currency" in section 1, in which a country or territory from those listed in the appendix is involved
     The first - if the value of the service or the value of using a single debit card, as the case may be,
                                             is at least 5,000 new shekels.
     A provider of currency services will report to the competent authority about actions of the service applicant that are foreseen (b)
     In his eyes as unusual, including an attempt to perform an action, but without the need to ask questions
     and clarification of facts in front of the service requester and the service recipient; Without prejudice to the generality of the subsection
              This, they may see an action from those detailed in the fifth appendix as an unusual action.

                          Chapter D: Checking identification details against a list

A currency service provider will check against the list - 11. Obligation to check against
                                                                                                                                   in front of the list
     If it contains the name or identity number of a service requester or a service recipient, it applies to him (1).

                                                                 to the list;

13:53, 3.11.2021 Money Laundering Prohibition Order (obligations to identify, report and manage records of financial asset service providers and credit service providers to prevent money laundering and terrorist financing), 2018...8-

        if the names of parties to the action are found in it; For this matter, "action" - any of these: () 2
                        Electronic transfer from Israel to abroad to Israel and from abroad to Israel; (a)
     A transfer from Israel to a country or territory listed in the first appendix, including (b)
       by paying checks presented by a financial institution in the aforementioned country or territory;
     A transfer from a country or territory listed in the first appendix to Israel, including (c)
     By paying checks drawn on a financial institution in the country or territory
                                                               As mentioned.



                                                     Chapter 5: Miscellany

A currency service provider shall determine policy, tools and risk management in the poor, prohibition of money laundering and financing. 12 Policy determination
     Terrorism for the purpose of fulfilling its obligations regarding identification, reporting and record management according to the law, including on issues
                                                                                    These are:
                                                                                       The process of getting to know the customer; () 1
     Monitoring the threats of money laundering and terrorist financing, arising, among other things, from technologies (2)
                   Innovations, in particular those that allow transactions not to be carried out face to face.
     A currency service provider whose annual turnover exceeds 3 million new shekels (a) 13. Management of records
     In a year, a computerized database of all operations and the required identification and reporting information will be established and saved
     According to this addendum, within 3 months from the end of the year in which the turnover of activity as mentioned above;
     For this matter, "annual activity turnover" - the total of all receipts and expenses of a service provider
                                                               currency per year.
     A currency service provider will keep the identification documents; For this matter, "identification documents" - any document (b)
     provided for the purpose of identification and verification, including a statement given according to this addendum as well as documents
                  Main points used by the currency service provider to familiarize the customer according to section 2
     A currency service provider will keep all the reporting details required according to section 9 as well as the documents (c)
     The operation in an amount exceeding 10,000 new shekels, and regarding the operation as mentioned in section (3b)
     or (c) - in an amount exceeding 5,000 new shekels; Saving an action document can
     which will be done through a computerized scan under the conditions specified in regulation 3a of the regulations
     The evidence (photographic copies), 1969-provided that the aforementioned document does not include a registration
                                which was drawn up in the handwriting of the person carrying out the action, including his signature.
     A currency service provider who established a database, whether or not he is obligated to establish the database according to section (d)
     Subsection (a) whether or not he is not obligated to do so, will keep in the database all the details of the actions performed by the recipient
                                                          Regular service in his name.
     A currency service provider will keep a written record of an activity inspection as stated in section 7 and its findings (e)
                                                       for a period of seven years.
     A currency service provider will keep the documents as stated in subsections (a) and (b) in attachment (f)
           and in an accessible manner, for a period of seven years from the end of the year in which the currency service was provided.
     A currency service provider will deliver to the registrar or whoever he authorizes, upon request, documents, information and explanations. 14 Delivery of documents,
     In connection with the fulfillment of his obligations according to this addendum; The supervisor authorized a person who is not a civil servant - will apply to information and explanations
                         That person has a duty of confidentiality regarding documents, information and explanations given to him.



                                                       First Appendix


                   (Sections (6, 4, 3, 1c)(8, a)(2(11,) 3b) and (-c), and the third and fifth appendices)
                                                  The States and Territories

     A country or territory to be determined by the head of the competent authority from the list of countries or territories. 1
     that the FATF organization has published a reservation regarding them regarding their compliance with the organization's recommendations regarding a ban
     Money laundering and terrorist financing. The head of the competent authority may order that section (8a)(2) of this addendum

will not apply to some of the countries and territories listed in this detail; Said instruction will be published
                                              on the website of the competent authority.
     The following countries or territories: Iran, Algeria, Afghanistan, the Palestinian Authority, Strip 2.
     Gaza, Libya, the Council of United Arab Principalities, Malaysia, Morocco, Sudan, Somalia, Pakistan,
                          Tunisia, Lebanon, Egypt, Syria, Saudi Arabia, the Kingdom of Jordan, Iraq, Yemen.

                                                   (section (2c) and (f))
